meta.groupDetails: Two 17‑year‑old boys, 2 males in their 40s, 4 females in their 40s

report:
Flexible curated options for your Budapest winter trip (Dec 20, 2025–Jan 1, 2026):

• Accommodations – we suggest booking centrally (e.g., near Christmas markets or Castle District) with early reservation due to holiday demand.
• Weather – expect highs around 5 °C (41 °F), ~8.5 h daylight; pack heavy coats, scarves, gloves, waterproof boots. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Cultural & Historical Highlights – guided tours of Parliament (book ahead); St. Stephen’s Basilica dome; Fisherman’s Bastion views. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Local Food & Dining – sample chimney cake (kürtőskalács), mulled wine, goulash at Christmas markets. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Markets & Shopping – Vörösmarty Square and Basilica Christmas markets (mid-Nov to Jan 1); Magic Grove in City Park; smaller markets in Óbuda and Madách Square. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Outdoor Adventures & Nature – soak at Széchenyi Thermal Baths (open all holidays); skate at City Park Ice Rink; ride nostalgia forest railway; Christmas tram rides. ([budapest.org](https://www.budapest.org/en/budapest-thermal-baths/szechenyi-baths/?utm_source=openai))
• Day Trips / Excursions – consider off‑the‑beaten‑path strolls along Napraforgó Street, cave church at Gellért Hill, or Bauhaus architecture. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Evening & Nightlife – ruin bars (Szimpla, etc.) for cozy evenings; New Year’s Eve Danube cruises or Bastion viewpoints for fireworks. ([ticket-budapest.com](https://www.ticket-budapest.com/travel-guide/best-time-to-visit/budapest-in-december/?utm_source=openai))
• Seasonal or Special Events – Christmas Eve/Day cruises and organ concert at Basilica; Lumina Park light installations Dec 25–26; New Year’s concerts; streetcar and festive tram rides; Magic Grove until Jan 1. ([budapestbylocals.com](https://www.budapestbylocals.com/december-in-budapest/?utm_source=openai))

Note holiday‑specific timings and potential closures (e.g., Basilica market open until Jan 1; Széchenyi Baths open even on Dec 31 and Jan 1). ([budapest.org](https://www.budapest.org/en/budapest-thermal-baths/szechenyi-baths/?utm_source=openai))

Weather.name: Typical December Weather
Weather.short_description: Expect chilly winter conditions—highs around 5 °C (~41 °F), ~8.5 hours daylight

Cultural & Historical Highlights.name: Hungarian Parliament Tour
Cultural & Historical Highlights.short_description: Audio‑guided tour inside the neo‑Gothic Parliament building

Cultural & Historical Highlights.name: St. Stephen’s Basilica Dome Visit
Cultural & Historical Highlights.short_description: Elevator or stair access to dome for panoramic views

Markets & Shopping.name: Vörösmarty Square Christmas Market
Markets & Shopping.short_description: Historic, central market with crafts and food stalls

Markets & Shopping.name: Basilica Christmas Market
Markets & Shopping.short_description: Festive market with light projections and skating rink
Markets & Shopping.address: St. Stephen’s Square, Budapest District V

Markets & Shopping.name: Magic Grove (City Park Holiday Fair)
Markets & Shopping.short_description: Family‑oriented fair with carousel, mini‑railway, crafts

Outdoor Adventures & Nature.name: Széchenyi Thermal Baths
Outdoor Adventures & Nature.short_description: Heated indoor/outdoor thermal baths open even on holidays
Outdoor Adventures & Nature.price_extraction_note: from official info page ticket price

Outdoor Adventures & Nature.name: City Park Ice Rink
Outdoor Adventures & Nature.short_description: World’s largest open‑air artificial ice rink
Outdoor Adventures & Nature.price_extraction_note: no price in summary, public rink

Day Trips / Excursions.name: Gellért Hill Cave Church
Day Trips / Excursions.short_description: Quiet chapel carved into Gellért Hill—peaceful Advent visit

Day Trips / Excursions.name: Napraforgó Street Modernist Walk
Day Trips / Excursions.short_description: Stroll interwar Bauhaus villas with coffee stops

Evening & Nightlife Experiences.name: Ruin Bars (e.g., Szimpla Kert)
Evening & Nightlife Experiences.short_description: Cozy ruin‑bar nightlife—mulled wine nights in winter

Evening & Nightlife Experiences.name: New Year’s Eve at Fisherman’s Bastion
Evening & Nightlife Experiences.short_description: Panoramic open‑air NYE view—fireworks, quieter environment

Seasonal or Special Events.name: Lumina Park (Margaret Island)
Seasonal or Special Events.short_description: LED light installation walk; open Dec 25–26
Seasonal or Special Events.address: Palatinus Bath site, Margaret Island, Budapest

contacts_vcards.name: Széchenyi Thermal Baths
contacts_vcards.note: Thermal bath open daily including holidays; ticket ~€39
